title: 1dgenARMA11
description: Program to generate an ARMA(1,1) time series, for simulation studies. Results are written to stdout.

length.title: Length of time series
length.description: Specify the length of the time series vector to generate (equivalent to -len option).

length_alt.title: Length of time series (alternative)
length_alt.description: Specify the length of the time series vector to generate (equivalent to -num option).

num_series.title: Number of time series vectors
num_series.description: The number of time series vectors to generate; defaults to 1 if not given.

normalize.title: Normalize Flag
normalize.description: Normalize time series so sum of squares is 1.

corcut.title: Correlation Cutoff
corcut.description: Specify a cutoff for the correlation coefficient r(k) of noise samples at k units apart. Default is 0.00010.

arma31.title: Restricted ARMA(3,1) model parameters
arma31.description: Specify parameters for a restricted ARMA(3,1) model: -arma31 a r theta vrat

arma51.title: Restricted ARMA(5,1) model parameters
arma51.description: Specify parameters for a restricted ARMA(5,1) model: -arma51 a r1 theta1 r2 theta2 vrat
